citations.narrative:
G2-13: An open bag of fresh grapes was found on a cart in investigator lab space. The bag of grapes was next to a bottle
of floor cleaning solution, the top of the bottle was ajar and not closed tightly, and there were also other items on the cart
including a sharps container. The grapes are food enrichment/positive reinforcement for the non-human primates,
however no NHPs had been brought to the lab space on the day of the inspection.
Per this Section, supplies of food must be stored in a manner that protects the food from spoilage and contamination.
Improper storage of food items can affect nutritive value and palatability as well as result in contamination of the food. An
open bag of food placed next to an open bottle of cleaning solution can become contaminated. Substances that are toxic
to nonhuman primates but are required for normal husbandry practices must not be stored in food storage and
preparation areas but may be stored in cabinets in the animal area.
This inspection was conducted with facility representatives from 1/21/25 through 1/23/25. The exit briefing was held
1/23/25.
*END OF REPORT*
n

Per this Section, supplies of food must be stored in a manner that protects the food from spoilage and contamination. 
Improper storage of food items can affect nutritive value and palatability as well as result in contamination of the food. An 
open bag of food placed next to an open bottle of cleaning solution can become contaminated. Substances that are toxic 
to nonhuman primates but are required for normal husbandry practices must not be stored in food storage and 
preparation areas but may be stored in cabinets in the animal area. 
 
This inspection was conducted with facility representatives from 1/21/25 through 1/23/25. The exit briefing was held
